Sorry, I can't remember the name of it. It's down there in Zebulon where
H.=
B lives.
I am sure that he will take you there at sometime.....

__________=
______________________

From: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com [mailto:EVP-ITC@yahoo=
groups.com] On Behalf
Of Chad Wiggins
Sent: Monday, August 18, 2008 11:21 A=
M
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Unexpected aspects of =
the 469



Actually, I went to the Old Roswell Cemetery. Which one are you =
talking
about? I'd love to go.

Chad


----- Original Message ----
From: "F=
ransen, Debbie" <debbie.fransen@...>
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
Sent=
: Monday, August 18, 2008 10:32:37 AM
Subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] Unexpected asp=
ects of the 469



Chad,
If you went to the cemetary with H.Analyst, I prob=
ably know which one
you went to.
There are some not so nice things that hap=
pen at that cemetary.... .
Deb

________________________________

From: EVP=
-ITC@yahoogroups .com [mailto:EVP- ITC@yahoogroups. com] On
Behalf Of Zack =
Widup
Sent: Monday, August 18, 2008 10:31 AM
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com
S=
ubject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Unexpected aspects of the 469




I haven't experienc=
ed the EVP/ITC, but many cemeteries have guardians
that 
try to ward you of=
f in various ways. From my experience, if they finally

decide you're not t=
here to do harm they will kind of back off and leave 
you alone.

A simple =
thing like straightening a skewed tombstone or cleaning up a
mess 
will con=
vince them you're not there to harm. Also, tell them that you're

not there=
 to do damage.

Zack

On Mon, 18 Aug 2008, Chad wrote:

> Just wondering if=
 you guys have ever experienced anything like what
> I'm about to describe.=

>
> I was doing an investigation at a cemetery the other night. My
> girlf=
riend was using the 469 with headphones. It started to spook her
> a little=
 and she gave me the box. I put in the headphones and didn't
> hear anythin=
g out of the normal radio scan. Then I heard footsteps
> circling me. I sta=
rted looking around and asked if anyone else was
> hearing them. I then got=
 attacked by an entity in the cemetery. It
> felt a lot like a schoolyard b=
ully circling you before he hits you,
> and then a big rush of energy. I ca=
n't really describe the feeling.
>
> Then, the other night I was on a separ=
ate investigation and was in a
> bathroom. I was hearing water dripping, bu=
t when I checked the
> possible sources they were bone dry.
>
> Is it possi=
ble that these noises can come clearly through the 469? I
> do not have any=
 psychic ability I know of. They are very real, and are
> definitely happen=
ing, not being imagined. Maybe it has something to do
> with the headphones=
? I cannot explain this. Have any of you had a
> similar experience?
>
>
> =
